name: Nyan Cat: Lost In Space
description: Play with the most celebrated flying cat in human history. Drink milk, eat ice-cream, collect coins, buy gorgeous boosts, fly like a superhero (sorry... supercat), jump onto platforms made of cake, avoid angry dogs, and discover the infinite space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Microsoft Windows compatible

reviews.review_text: I played about 20 minutes of it, the music just got boring after a while, because I could not find the dang mute button. The game is just not worth 3 bucks in my opinion, it feels like a free app on a phone, which you could possibly get more enjoyment out of than this, I just learned how to use commas, and I probably such for not withstanding the song for 20 minutes. Started up the game, heard the music and immediately wanted to kill myself.

Snagged this one while it was on sale and it still wasn't worth it imho. Note that I don't have a smartphone (legasp!) so I have no way to compare. Take that how you will.  Pros: - Nyan. :3 - Make your own nyan cat. - Ok backgrounds and premade skin packs I guess.  Cons: - The gameplay for any of the modes about as redundant as the soundtrack. Good for a few minutes but after a while it gets boring/annoying. - Double-jumping is the only thing that seemed to get me anywhere in the original mode, not to mention the lack of control once you're flying. - A better way to see what's above/below you at least in terms of platforms would be great. :/ - Getting enough coins to save for permanent upgrades can take ages, especially given the above. Amen for no microtransactions with this  insanely obvious  mobile port.

Nyan Cat: Lost In Space, Its a good time waster i wouldnt say its my favorite game..It was cheap LOL so it was worth it at that..easy Achievments, Some challenges are well yea challenging but not alot. i give it a 8/10. would play it again when im bored lol
this game is.... AWESOMEEE! :D  the awesome nyan cat soundtrack is playing all the time so you can fully enjoy it! you can make your own nyan cat!!!  you can make your nyan cat a nice home!!!
this game is so cuuuuteeeeee
The best dollar seventy-NYAN ever spent!
An amusing time-killer. Not overly challenging, but humorous, and with a ton to unlock, upgrade, and customize. Its only downside is the soundtrack getting quickly repetitive, but it is toggleable.

Nyan cat forever  the game with 10 milion downloads on smartphone (free) and the PC you need to pay 3 euros for have that game on big screen thats ridiculous  but I love that game , it s the only reason I bought the game  and its so adorable meow xD  I recommend with you have 3 euros to spend
I have played this game for literal hours.  The song is ingrained into every fiber of my being.  There is no peace. There is no individual. There is only Nyan Cat.  ...help... ...me...

No money at all is still too much money for this awful game.  10/10
once i found the option to turn off the nyan cat music this game became so much more enjoyable.   9.5/10
good game but not worth money

Got the game for less than 2$. Really fun when you have few minutes to play, but don't want to start a campaign in Skyrim or Civilization.

The game is pretty lame because all you do is jump and stuff around random things as a cat in a poptart, didn't change anything. It's not worth 3 dollars..
